document.full_text: seeking to recast relations during the arab spring, proposals by the european union to be presented wednesday would tie billions of euros of aid to progress in creating pluralist democracies.
document.title: e.u. ties future aid to arab world to democratic reforms
lines_and_colors: seeking to recast relations during the arab spring, proposals by the european union to be presented wednesday would tie billions of euros of aid to progress in creating pluralist democracies.
